translations: [生理] 神经递质；[生理] 神经传递素

sentences.sentence: Acetylcholine is also the principal neurotransmitter in all autonomic ganglia.
sentences.translation: 乙酰胆碱也是所有自主神经节的主要神经递质。

sentences.sentence: In general, action potentials that reach the synaptic knobs cause a neurotransmitter to be released into the synaptic cleft.
sentences.translation: 一般来说，动作电位到达突触节会导致神经递质释放到突触间隙。

sentences.sentence: Other antidepressants work on the neurotransmitter dopamine.
sentences.translation: 其他的抗抑郁药物作用于神经传递素多巴胺上。
